data.title: Disney Infinity - DEADPOOL
data.description:
Hey there, 
just got to see the movie premiere yesterday and DP2 was AWESOME!!!
Here is the homage project i did with my dear friend and colleague Sasha Krieger Ristic.
Follow the link to see the awesome modeling job Sasha did: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/lPLgk

Here you can see the Deadpool concept in Disney Infinity style, both of which i really, really love.
I hope you like what we did, 
and of course if you wish, feel free to use the concept for your modeling practices.

Hugz and Kissez, 
Vanja

data.title: Acceleration!
data.description: Colours! I had a lot of fun playing with style and trying to make all the colours feel cohesive. It was done as part of an art tournament with some friends where the topic was "acceleration".

I never liked green colors so making her with tons of greens def helped me to work a bit more with them! 
Hope you like it~

data.title: Machine
data.description:
Well I was inspired by Ghost in the shell and wanted to make kind of fan-art but during work I changed my conception. Because I really like new characters and new universes! I also had some experiments with new approaches and features, well this work was an overall experiment for me =) So next time I'll share some my insert meshes and some few other tools!
Special thanks to my friend Masha, whose photos I have used as references when sculpted the head.
And to my super talented friend Misha Dioxin whose music is in the movie! you can find more his compositions here: https://soundcloud.com/misha-dioxin/sets/kepler
my fb: https://www.facebook.com/fedor.losev.39?ref=bookmarks
my insta: https://www.instagram.com/mr.freedark/

data.description:

If you are interested, please follow this link

data.title: Lizard Riders
data.description: Here is a series of Lizard riders ranging from Komodo dragons to Red headed agamas. These initially started off as studies but I ended up added riders to them for fun =D

data.title: Tuareg chief
data.description:
After some years doing digital sculpting, this is my first time trying the traditional approach.  
I have to say, I was humbled and captivated by the process, having my hands touching the real material is mesmerizing to me.  
For sure this will not be my last attempt !   

Water based clay 
approximately life size.    
done in 2017

Add some WIP images as well.

data.title: Wushu Superstars 2
data.description: Personal project. The aim was to make stylished figures or toys from some of my favorites kung fu movies. I'm still working on it, and I hope I will find a way to 3D print them.

data.title: Lasergun
data.description:
I am not a big weapon Artist but, some designs on Artstation are super awesome.
I think its a tribute fan project for:
Aleksei Riabtsev | Refuser
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/LYYzr
This super scope design and:
Nicholas Cort
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/lkZQa
for the perfect weapon baseshape,
I modeled all in MoI3D, and rendered in OctaneforC4D with procedural shaders 
Hope you like it.

user.headline: Character / Creature Artist at Larian Studios

data.title: Stylized Fur and Hair Alpha Mini Tutorial
data.description:
Link to my 100+ Stylized Alpha Pack (that contains 14 fur alphas): https://gumroad.com/l/StlzdJR

Hey guys,
Since I released my Stylized Alpha Pack I got some questions on how I created the hair strands. This tutorial is mostly for new zbrush users, the pros probably won't find anything new here, but as long as it helps a single person I think it's worth it.

data.title: Vicarent vs Bascule [DEGENESIS]
data.description:
Another illustration done for Degenesis universe - featured in the most recent book 'BLACK ATLANTIC'.
I really enjoyed working on it, more painterly style is not something I do on a daily basis but always wanted to try. 
Thanks to Marko Djurdjevic for letting me be a part of this and great art direction.
